translated_contents.title: "살인해보고 싶었다" 잔혹범죄 23세 정유정 신상공개(종합2보)
translated_contents.content: Content: (Busan = News1) Reporter Roh Kyung -min = In Busan, the new information of women in their 20s who approached the tutoring brokerage app and murdered with a weapon and damaged and abandoned the body while deceiving his identity..The woman has been planning 'cruel criminals' through crime -related broadcasts and books..Born in 1999, he was 23 years old.On May 24, he approached the victim A (20s), saying, 'I want to receive English tutoring' through the tutoring brokerage app on May 24.I went to A's house and murdered it with a weapon.At that time, Jung Yoo -jeong was found to have been wearing a used uniform and lying to Mr. A that he was a middle school student and talking for a while.After returning to a travel bag (carrier), he went to A's house to damage the body.Some of the body was kept in the carrier, and at 0:50 am on the 27th of last month, Jung Yoo -jeong returned to his house and put a carrier in a taxi and abandoned a part of the body in the Nakdong River grass in Yangsan, Gyeongnam.The Taun Taxi driver reported to the police because it was suspicious that a woman dragged the carrier and entered the grass forest at dawn.'It turned out to have searched for keywords related to it.He has been learning cruel crimes while watching a crime investigation program through the usual broadcast, and he borrowed a novel about crime from the library. The police said, "I actually wanted to murder," and "the impulse of murder occurred."It's done."In addition, Jung Yoo -jeong said, "I'm sorry to the victims, the bereaved family, and the family." The police said."I seemed to be convinced that I could be able to do it." He also explained, "I also brought A's cell phone and ID card to the organic field to disguise it as a missing case."Is issued.The police will send it to the prosecution on the 2nd morning.Jung Yoo -jung was found to have been committed before the incident or was treated for mental illness."It is not possible to be a leading or dense personality when it was caught by the police early during the crime." In addition, "the approach in a school uniform is to the means to ensure the alertness of the other person without one -in -one."It's hard to judge whether it's a psychopath or antisocial criminal with a certain action. We need to take a closer look at how the suspect has lived in."If it is determined that the cruelty of the Sudan and the right to know the people are needed, it is possible to disclose it."It was found that the need for public interests, such as the prevention effect of the crime, was revealed."

who was suspicious of a taxi driver, he found a ID card when he found Jung Yoo -jeong.The place where the body was abandoned is a place he usually walked, and Jung Yoo -jung had a family who lived together.However, after graduating from high school, he has lived without interacting with his surroundings for many years.The police said they were prepared to get a job, but the police said they had Police officials said, "Jung Yoo -jung has never been diagnosed with psychosis, and there is no other before.""Cho Young -il, a professor of police administration at Dongguk University, a criminal psychological expert, said, “In order to fill the desire to harm people, the psychopathic temperament seems to be strong in search of a subject online.”It is a possibility of attempts to go to the crime and have a serial murder, ”he said.” On the other hand, the Busan Police Agency held a new information disclosure deliberation committee participating in internal and external experts on the 1st."We decided to disclose it by determining that the crime seriousness and cruelty were recognized and the public interests, such as the prevention effect of similar crimes, were decided."It's been about eight years after the firearms deodorization incident.

He was insisted that it was a 'accidental crime'.In addition, the digital forensic test of Jung Yoo -jeong's cell phone showed that he had focused on 'murder' and 'murderless murder case' three months ago, and it was confirmed that the library borrowed a large number of crime -related novels.After joining the parent, the police said that they seemed to have been subject to the tutor who lived alone for the crime.Especially on the day of the crime, Jung Yoo -jung wore a school uniform purchased at the Internet used marketplace to deceive him as a student, and visited Mr. A.In addition, Jung Yoo -jeong, who dreamed of a complete crime, was caught by the police after taking A's cell phone, ID card, and wallet to the body organic field to disguise him as if A was missing.He was a closed personality and had no workplace since he graduated from high school."We are currently inspecting psychopaths."He will send a refinery to the prosecution at 9 am.

translated_contents.title: 23세 정유정...'부산 또래여성 살인' 피의자 신상공개
translated_contents.content: Content: [Reporter E -Daily Park Ji -hye] The image of a 20 -year -old suspect who murdered and abandoned her body was revealed in Busan.The name is Jung Yoo -jeong and the age of 1999 and is a 23 -year -old woman.He said he was interested in the investigation program and said that he had a crime because he had an impulse for murder.Since February this year, three months before the crime, he confirmed that he searched for words such as 'murder', 'bodyless murder', and 'murder case' online, and said that he is analyzing the remaining records on his cell phone.There was no social ties at all, and there was no special job since I graduated from high school. ”Later, he was accused of throwing it in a tour bag in the Nakdong River, where he was walking in a travel bag.I contacted the victims who were registered as an extracurricular instructor in the part -time job app, saying, “I am looking for a tutor who will teach high school children.” I pretended to be a parent.Please take charge of it, ”“ Please make a pilot class and decide, ”he asked for an address.I brought a travel bag, and I stopped by the mart to buy a rocks and plastic bags.This seems to be the first time. ”

summary.title: "살인해보고 싶었다" 잔혹범죄 23세 정유정 신상공개(종합2보)
summary.content: A 23-year-old woman, identified as Jung Yoo-jeong, approached an English tutoring student through a tutoring app and murdered her at her house in May. Jung disguised herself as a middle school student and later damaged and abandoned the victim's body in a carrier bag. Her taxi driver became suspicious and reported the incident to the police. Jung was found to have been planning her crime by watching a crime investigation program and reading crime novels. She admitted to wanting to murder and apologized to the victim's family. The police will send her to the prosecution, and Jung was previously treated for mental illness. The police stated that it is difficult to determine if she is a psychopath or an antisocial criminal and that further investigation is needed. It is possible to disclose her identity if it is determined that it is necessary for public interest.

summary.title: 살인해보고 싶었다는 23살 정유정…"사이코패스·연쇄살인 성향"
summary.content: A 23-year-old woman named Jung Yoo-jung was arrested for killing women, damaging their bodies and abandoning them in Busan. She has a psychopathic tendency and has confessed to committing the crime. She approached the victim by impersonating parents on a tutoring app that connects students and teachers, and visited Mr. A's house in school uniform on the 26th of last month. Jung Yoo-jung confirmed whether there was no one with A and committed the crime with a prepared weapon. She carried the body in a travel carrier and abandoned it near the Nakdong River. Jung Yoo-jung has never had a job but was preparing to get one. Prof. Cho Young-il from Dongguk University says that she has a psychopathic temperament. The Busan Police Agency has decided to disclose the information, after internal and external experts agreed that the crime seriousness and cruelty was recognized along with public interest.

summary.title: [속보] 과외앱서 만난 20대 여성 살해·시신 유기한 정유정 신상공개
summary.content: A 23-year-old woman named Jung Yoo-jung was released from custody on the 1st of June for the murder of a woman in her 20s who she met through an online tutoring app. The victim's body was abandoned. The police officials have released Jung Yoo-jung's name, age, and photos to the public. Despite confessing to the crime, she denied wanting to kill the victim during her trial. Her release has caused controversy and uproar, especially since she had previously been released for a firearm incident eight years prior. There is a growing concern about the safety and security of online tutoring apps.

summary.title: '온라인 앱 살인' 피의자 정유정 신상 공개
summary.content: A 23-year-old woman, Jung Yoo-jeong, who murdered and abandoned a woman in her 20s that she met on online apps, had her personal information disclosed by the Busan Police Agency. The decision was made during a personal information disclosure committee, where seven members were present. Police believe that the gravity and cruelty of the crime justify the need for the disclosure of Jung's personal information to the public. During the police investigation on May 31, Jung confessed to the crime saying, "I accidentally committed the crime... I wanted to kill." This seems to be the first time Jung has committed such a crime.

summary.title: '또래 여성 살해·시신 유기' 99년생 정유정 신상 공개
summary.content: A 99-year-old woman named Jeong Yu-jeong was arrested for the murder and abandonment of a peer woman she met through an app. She allegedly killed the victim, who was wearing a school uniform, and left her body in her house in Geumjeong-gu, Busan. The suspect reportedly planned the crime for three months. The Busan Police Agency held a public deliberation committee and decided to release her identity to the public for the sake of public interest and prevention.

summary.title: '살인해 보고 싶어서' 피의자 만 23세 정유정…신상공개(종합)
summary.content: A 23-year-old woman named Jung Yoo-jeong was arrested for killing and abandoning her victim's body in Busan, South Korea. Jung killed a young woman named A by using a weapon, damaging her body, and leaving it in the grass of the Nakdong River. Even after she was caught, Jung insisted that it was an 'accidental crime'. The police found that Jung was dreaming of committing a murder, and her cell phone was full of searches about murder and crime-related novels. She wore a school uniform when she committed the crime and pretended to deceive her victim. After killing A, Jung took the victim's cell phone, ID and wallet to the body organic field, disguising the victim's disappearance. When the police arrested her, they found some of the rest of the victim's body in A's residential area. Jung was a recluse and had no workplace since graduating from high school. The police believe that Jung might be a psychopath and will send her to the prosecution at 9 am.

summary.title: 부산 20대 여성 살인 피의자는 23살 정유정
summary.content: A 23-year-old woman named Jung Yoo-jung has been identified as the suspect in the murder of a woman in Geumjeong, Busan. The Busan Police Agency decided to disclose her face, name, and age due to the seriousness and cruelty of the crime and the need for public interest. The murder occurred eight years after a gun range shooting in Busanjin-gu in October. Jung is accused of promising to tutor a student, but instead, going to the student's house and committing the murder. Investigations are ongoing.

summary.title: 과외앱서 만난 20대 여성 살해·시신 유기한 정유정 신상공개(종합)
summary.content: A 23-year-old woman named Jung Yoo-jeong who met with her victim through an online tutoring app, was arrested for murdering a woman in her 20s and abandoning her body. The police released Jung’s name, age, and photograph through the Personal Information Disclosure Deliberation Committee on June 1st. Jung had no social ties and no special jobs since graduating from high school. Police confirmed that Jung had confirmed the target of the crime and had borrowed novels related to crime. The victim's body was found abandoned by a taxi driver, and the rest of the body was found in the victim's house. The crime took place in Geumjeong-gu, Busan on May 26th.

summary.title: 23세 정유정...'부산 또래여성 살인' 피의자 신상공개
summary.content: A 23-year-old woman, identified as Jung Yoo-jeong, has been revealed as the suspect who killed and abandoned a woman's body in Busan. The suspect had an interest in an investigation program and stated that she committed the crime out of an impulse for murder. She searched for related terms online three months prior to the crime. The suspect had no social ties and no job since graduating high school. She contacted the victim, who was an extracurricular instructor, by pretending to be a parent looking for a tutor for high school children. The suspect brought a travel bag, rocks, and plastic bags to dispose of the body in the Nakdong River.

analyze.one_line: 20대 여성 이용자를 만나 살해한 23살 정유정의 신상이 공개되었다.
analyze.fact_summary: 부산의 20대 여성 피해자가 정유정이라는 23살 여성에 의해 살해됐다. 정유정은 과외 앱에서 피해자와 만났으며, 살해 후 시신을 유기한 혐의로 구속됐다. 정유정의 신상은 공개되었고, 정신적 문제와 사이코패스적 성향 때문에 현재 검토 중이다.
analyze.easy_summary: 20대 여성이 과외앱에서 만난 상대방이 시신 유기한 23살 여성 정유정이라는 사건이 일어났다. 정유정은 현재 신상정보가 공개되어, 사이코패스적 성향으로 논란이 되고 있다. 보다 안전한 인터넷 이용을 위한 대책이 필요하다.
